alert.note: Alert for Limestone; Madison (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 11 at 8:30PM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Madison and northeastern Limestone Counties through 900 PM CDT... At 830 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Ardmore, or 8 miles north of Athens, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Northwestern Huntsville, Athens, Meridianville, Hazel Green, Harvest, Elkmont, Toney and Holland Gin. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CDT for north central Alabama.
